channel.title: EpocCam on Falko Döhring
channel.description: Recent content in EpocCam on Falko Döhring

item.title: Enabling EpocCam with MS Teams
item.description: For work I use the communication platform MS Teams, which makes having a webcam kind of mandatory. Since I used to work with my laptop in clamshell mode, I wasn’t able to use the internal webcam. That’s when I discovered EpocCam, a software, which makes it possible to use a smartphone as webcam. Using your smartphone is not only pretty convenient but has also very good quality when compared with a standard webcam.
